description: {"blocks":[{"key":"997fj","text":"To obtain cortical culture, pregnant mice were anesthetized, embryos were dissected, and cortex was collected in PBS. Tissues were incubated in 0.25% trypsin–EDTA at 37°C for 15 min. Trypsinized tissue was transferred into a high-glucose DMEM/F12 medium supplemented with 10% FBS. After centrifugation (1500rpm, 5 min), the pellet was resuspended. Cells were plated onto poly(L-lysine)-coated 24-well plates at 106cells per well and cultured in NB-A.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":413,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6smmr","text":"For primary cortical mixed culture - Use C57BL/6J mice at embryonic day 17 ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"44o48","text":"Anesthetized pregnant mice (1% sodium pentobarbital, 80mg/kg), dissect their embryos and collect the cortex. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"706n2","text":"(Separate and remove the soft membrane and blood vessels, rinse the cerebral cortex in PBS, and use the ophthalmic scissor to cut pieces of the cortex)","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2hk0j","text":"Collect the cortices in PBS  in a 50 ml tube on ice","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cehq5","text":"(The 50 ml tube contains 30 ml of PBS)     )   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":39,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":41,"length":1},{"key":2,"offset":45,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cb0li","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"C97344E48DEE11ECA1850A58A9FEAC02","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"92E9130082E611ECB71039C52E819CDE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":2}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"74FE620082E611ECB71039C52E819CDE","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"","unit":165}}}}
